summary: Adds a basic draugr companion and a book to summon a pirate fighter.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/1z4wg0p.jpg[/img]
Image byÂ mysticentity

A WIP mod.

The hall of the dead in Whiterun has a new guest, Jarl Winter a Draugr companion (WIP but usable). Calixto's House of Curiosities in Windhelm has a few more books, one of which will summon a Pirate fighter. The fighter will last a few days before he leaves again ( or if he is defeated).

This is very much a work in progress. In the final version I will add some back story quests and custom voice over.

When you tell Jarl Winter to leave he will return to Whiterun.

Enjoy!
author: Beretta
